Title: Amends the public health law to add dysmenorrhea as a covered condition for medical marihuana
Summary: Relates to adding dysmenorrhea as a covered condition for lawful medical use of marihuana.
LawCode: Amd ยง3360, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to adding dysmenorrhea to the list of conditions covered for lawful medical use of marihuana
